verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Tell the blessed story, of the cross of Jesus.
Tell the blessed story, of the hallowed cross.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Until every nation, learns of full salvation.
Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Church of God awaken, heed the Lord's command.
Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Fields are white for harvesting, on ev'ry hand.
Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Has He not commissioned you, the news to bear.
Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Go ye into all the world, and ev'rywhere
Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Stand no longer idle, while the moments fly.
Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Multitudes in heathen darkness live and die.
Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Publish unto all the world redeeming grace.
Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Until in the home of rest you find your place,
Tell the blessed story of the cross.
